message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $13,000. It's a very fair price for what the product offers.
I see your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product.
